overview: Documentary feature film focusing on the life and career of Bajrush Mjaku, a ground-breaking actor who was active and still inspiring the Theaters in Balkans and worldwide. A superstar in the art world, but little known outside the theaters professionals and audiences, why does Bajrus Mjaku continue to excite passions? This brilliant, gifted and visionary actor, father and grandfather give us his story overlapping some half of the century of professional success and dedication to his family, through most hard times to represents his Albanian culture. Always keeping his family together, always make audiences applause, smile and cry to his performance on the scene. His mission is Acting, and his Acting is the mission.
title: 101 Roles 102 Lifes, Bajrush Mjaku
